channel.title: flashQ Blog
channel.description: Tutorials, guides, and insights about job queues, AI pipelines, and background processing.

item.title: flashQ for Blockchain: 14 Use Cases That Replace Expensive Infrastructure
item.description: Build self-hosted blockchain infrastructure with flashQ. Transaction relayers, NFT minting queues, airdrops, keepers, bridges. Replace OpenZeppelin Defender and Gelato.

item.title: flashQ + Elysia & Hono.js: Modern Bun-Powered Background Jobs
item.description: Integrate flashQ with Elysia and Hono.js for blazing-fast background job processing with Bun.

item.title: flashQ in Action: Live Demo of All Features
item.description: Interactive walkthrough: priorities, retries, DLQ, rate limiting, cron jobs, workflows, and real-time monitoring.

item.title: Debugging flashQ: Logs, Metrics, and Troubleshooting Guide
item.description: Diagnose stuck jobs, memory issues, connection problems, and performance bottlenecks.

item.title: flashQ Production Checklist: 15 Must-Do Steps Before Going Live
item.description: Security, persistence, monitoring, and scaling configurations you must set before going live.

item.title: flashQ + Next.js: Background Jobs for Vercel
item.description: Build background job processing for Next.js apps. Perfect for Vercel, serverless, and edge deployments.

item.title: Migrating from BullMQ to flashQ: Step-by-Step Guide
item.description: Complete migration guide from BullMQ to flashQ. API mapping, code examples, and migration strategies.

item.title: Building Webhook Handlers with flashQ
item.description: Secure, reliable webhook handlers for Stripe, GitHub, and custom integrations.

item.title: Building a RAG Chatbot with flashQ and OpenAI
item.description: Build a production RAG chatbot with document ingestion, vector search, and async LLM processing.

item.title: Building AI Agents with flashQ and LangChain
item.description: Build production AI agents: async tools, multi-agent orchestration, memory, and monitoring.

item.title: Testing AI Pipelines with flashQ
item.description: Test AI workloads: mocking LLMs, integration tests, performance benchmarks, and CI/CD strategies.

item.title: Cost Optimization for AI APIs with flashQ
item.description: Cut AI API costs by 70%. Caching, batching, model routing, and budget controls with flashQ.

item.title: Scaling flashQ with Clustering: High Availability Guide
item.description: Multi-node deployment with automatic leader election and zero-downtime failover.

item.title: Error Handling & Retry Patterns in flashQ
item.description: Retry strategies, exponential backoff, dead letter queues, circuit breakers, and more.

item.title: flashQ Security Best Practices
item.description: Secure your queue: authentication, encryption, input validation, network policies, and compliance.

item.title: Webhooks and Event-Driven Architecture with flashQ
item.description: Build reliable webhook handlers for Stripe, GitHub, and more. Event sourcing and CQRS patterns.

item.title: Deploying flashQ with Docker and Kubernetes
item.description: Production deployment guide: Docker Compose, Kubernetes manifests, HPA, and monitoring setup.

item.title: flashQ Cron Jobs: Complete Scheduling Guide
item.description: Master cron jobs with flashQ. Syntax, timezone handling, error recovery, and production patterns.

item.title: Monitoring AI Pipelines: Metrics, Alerts, and Dashboards
item.description: Set up comprehensive monitoring for your AI pipelines with Prometheus, Grafana, and flashQ metrics.

item.title: How to Rate Limit OpenAI API Calls with flashQ
item.description: Learn how to properly rate limit OpenAI, Anthropic, and other AI API calls. Avoid 429 errors and control costs.

item.title: Job Queue Patterns for AI Applications
item.description: Essential patterns for building reliable AI applications: fan-out, sagas, circuit breakers, and more.

item.title: Building AI Pipelines with flashQ: A Complete Guide
item.description: Learn how to build production-ready RAG pipelines, LLM workflows, and batch inference systems using flashQ.

item.title: flashQ Architecture: How We Built a 1.9M Jobs/sec Queue Server
item.description: Deep dive into flashQ's sharded design, lock-free data structures, and optimizations that achieve 1.9M jobs/sec.

item.title: flashQ vs BullMQ: Why We Built a Redis-Free Alternative
item.description: A detailed comparison between flashQ and BullMQ. Learn when to use each and why going Redis-free matters.

item.title: What is flashQ? A Modern Job Queue for AI Workloads
item.description: Discover why we built flashQ, a high-performance job queue designed specifically for AI and ML workloads. No Redis required.
